body_html:
I assume that sqlite build issue is everywhere. But with newer gcc versions there is also the eigen build issue. For sqlite, we have to conditionally exclude sqlite targets if we are building for s390x. Do you have a link for that build result(log)?
…
On Tue, Sep 18, 2018 at 5:02 AM Nayana Thorat ***@***.***> wrote: @gunan <https://github.com/gunan> We are observing different issues with different GCC version with vectorization: 1. With gcc 6.3.0 , Ubuntu 16.04, z13 : Sqlite build issue 2. With gcc 6.3.0/7.3.0 , Ubuntu 16.04, z14 : TF build failure on Eigen /internal compiler error. 3. With gcc 7.3.0 , Ubuntu 18.04, z14 : TF buil dfailure on Eigen. We are currently investigating more on Eigen failures. (Any pointers on this would be helpful) For sqlite , tried to comment out download sqlite code from tensorflow/workspace.bzl but it didn't help. Is there any option in configure through which we can disable this feature? — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#22023 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AHlCOY03j0JtMim2g2NGllMd3sGdOnnkks5ucODVgaJpZM4WXOaw> .
body_text:
I assume that sqlite build issue is everywhere. But with newer gcc versions
there is also the eigen build issue.

For sqlite, we have to conditionally exclude sqlite targets if we are
building for s390x.
Do you have a link for that build result(log)?
…
On Tue, Sep 18, 2018 at 5:02 AM Nayana Thorat ***@***.***> wrote:
 @gunan <https://github.com/gunan> We are observing different issues with
 different GCC version with vectorization:

    1. With gcc 6.3.0 , Ubuntu 16.04, z13 : Sqlite build issue
    2. With gcc 6.3.0/7.3.0 , Ubuntu 16.04, z14 : TF build failure on
    Eigen /internal compiler error.
    3. With gcc 7.3.0 , Ubuntu 18.04, z14 : TF buil dfailure on Eigen.
    We are currently investigating more on Eigen failures. (Any pointers
    on this would be helpful)

 For sqlite , tried to comment out download sqlite code from
 tensorflow/workspace.bzl but it didn't help. Is there any option in
 configure through which we can disable this feature?

 —

body:
I assume that sqlite build issue is everywhere. But with newer gcc versions
there is also the eigen build issue.

For sqlite, we have to conditionally exclude sqlite targets if we are
building for s390x.
Do you have a link for that build result(log)?

On Tue, Sep 18, 2018 at 5:02 AM Nayana Thorat <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> @gunan <https://github.com/gunan> We are observing different issues with
> different GCC version with vectorization:
>
>    1. With gcc 6.3.0 , Ubuntu 16.04, z13 : Sqlite build issue
>    2. With gcc 6.3.0/7.3.0 , Ubuntu 16.04, z14 : TF build failure on
>    Eigen /internal compiler error.
>    3. With gcc 7.3.0 , Ubuntu 18.04, z14 : TF buil dfailure on Eigen.
>    We are currently investigating more on Eigen failures. (Any pointers
>    on this would be helpful)
>
> For sqlite , tried to comment out download sqlite code from
> tensorflow/workspace.bzl but it didn't help. Is there any option in
> configure through which we can disable this feature?
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
